column3: food--everything deserved five stars. Took the BF here for his birthday and he said it's the best ribeye he's ever had! And the bacon.. oooh you cannot forget the bacon
column4: so good! I ordered the petite duchess
column5: it was good but after trying my BF's ribeye
column6: it was amaaaazeballs! I gotta come back and order the ribeye next time. We also tried the elote and mac & cheese
column7: both were good but I think I'll skip the mac & cheese next time (good but too rich). We'll be back for my birthday!
